name: Project Magnus
description: Project Magnus is a single player, 2D side-scrolling puzzle platformer that incorporates unique magnetic mechanics into it’s puzzles. Play as Magnus – a failed test subject turned creature seeking freedom from the Magnus Project Laboratory. The player must utilize Magnus’s ability to manipulate magnetic charge to navigate the environment, solve puzzles, and escape the facility. Magnus can also shoot a projectile ‘mini-Magnus’, which has a magnetic charge and can interact with objects.
